situation.title: Libraries
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations on the closing of libraries.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The operation of libraries is banned.

Many libraries have extended their loan periods. If you want to know the rules for loans established by individual libraries, check their website.

If you need books - for school, work or leisure, try the databases of electronic resources. You can look at the current offer of electronic resources on the library websites. University libraries usually offer free access to these resources for university students. Look for these options on the websites of the university or faculty.
